changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Adjust modules and roles for the new pages
changeSet.sql: insert into system_role_module (id, has_select, has_add, has_update, has_delete, system_role_id, system_module_id) select nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' ), 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', r.id, m.id from system_role r, system_module m where trim(r.name) = 'LabDashboard' and m.name = 'LabDashboard'

insert into system_role_module (id, has_select, has_add, has_update, has_delete, system_role_id, system_module_id) select nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' ), 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', r.id, m.id from system_role r, system_module m where trim(r.name) = 'Upload' and m.name = 'Upload'

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Increase the column size for panel_item
changeSet.sql: alter table "panel_item" alter column "test_local_abbrev" type varchar(100);

changeSet.sql: insert into system_role_module (id, has_select, has_add, has_update, has_delete, system_role_id, system_module_id) select nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' ), 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', r.id, m.id from system_role r, system_module m where trim(r.name) = 'LabDashboard' and m.name = 'LabDashboard'

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Add module for validation of all sections
changeSet.sql: insert into system_role_module (id, has_select, has_add, has_update, has_delete, system_role_id, system_module_id) select nextval( 'system_user_module_seq' ), 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', 'Y', r.id, m.id from system_role r, system_module m where trim(r.name) = 'Validation' and m.name = 'ResultValidation:All Sections'

ALTER TABLE "note" ALTER COLUMN "text" type text;

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Ensure uuid present in sample table
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.sample set uuid = uuid_generate_v4() where uuid is null;

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Ensure uuid present in test_section table
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.test_section set uuid = uuid_generate_v4() where uuid is null;

changeSet.comment: Ensure uuid present in unit_of_measure table
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.unit_of_measure set uuid = uuid_generate_v4() where uuid is null;

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Ensure uuid present in type_of_sample table
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.type_of_sample set uuid = uuid_generate_v4() where uuid is null;
